name: Paths of Adventure
description:
Imagine a game where every move you make in combat is shaped by a unique dialogue-driven choice system, and every decision you make in the story has real consequences. 

That's our narrative-driven tactical RPG, where we're bringing the flavor of tabletop gaming to the digital realm for an immersive and meaningful experience.

For now this is just a proof of concept build made for playtesting and gather feedback. You play just like any other visual novel by making choices presented to you.

The story is also just an initial concept and is very subject to change in the future. We would love to hear your thoughts about this idea.
